snippet: Friends and relatives of Ali’s in his hometown of Louisville, Ky., recalled the young fighter shadowboxing in school hallways and trying to impress girls by racing the bus home on foot.
abstract: Scores of Louisville, Ky, residents visit Muhammad Ali Center to pay their respects to hometown hero Muhammad Ali, former heavyweight boxing champion who died after decades-long struggle with Parkinson's disease.
lead_paragraph: Friends and relatives of Ali’s in his hometown of Louisville, Ky., recalled the young fighter shadowboxing in school hallways and trying to impress girls by racing the bus home on foot.

headline.main: Muhammad Ali Remembered, by Those Who Knew Him as Cassius
headline.print_headline: Ali Remembered, by Those Who Knew Him as Cassius
